teams.name: Guys holding fish
teams.loan_because: We feel an affinity for entrepreneurs that make their living by fishing, selling fish, or attempting to make their lives better because of their proximity to the ocean, or freshwater locales...
teams.description:
We love fish and/or fishing so much that many of us have chosen to present ourselves on KIVA with a photo of ourselves, holding a fish!  We welcome "gals" to join, as well, the name of the team notwithstanding...  

We certainly support "sustainable" fishing, but also recognize that sometimes, our "Western" views of resource management may not match the needs of the very desperate folks, in other countries, struggling to make a living, or even providing food for their families ...  Our intent is to help the struggling, without regard to their profession or trade.  We believe that our lending record well represents that goal, as we are a pretty diverse group, with very diverse lending interests....

teams.description: We are a global group of people who understand that the world is run according to a system that is inefficient and unsustainable. We would like to change that

teams.name: The Zeitgeist Movement - Global
teams.loan_because:
The Zeitgeist Movement is a Sustainability Advocacy Organization which conducts community based activism and awareness actions through Charity Work a network of Global/Regional Chapters, Project Teams, Annual Events and Media.

The Movement's principle focus includes the recognition that the majority of the social problems which plague the human species at this time are not the sole result of some institutional corruption, scarcity, a political policy, a flaw of "human nature" or other commonly held assumptions of causality.
teams.description: We have no allegiance to a country or traditional political platforms. We view the world as a single system and the human species as a single family and recognizes that all countries must disarm and learn to share resources and ideas if we expect to survive in the long run. Hence, the solutions arrived at and promoted are in the interest to help everyone on the planet Earth, not a select group.

teams.name: Pure Entrepreneurship
teams.loan_because:
Our passion for entrepreneurship inspires us to extend a hand to foster the development of sustainable businesses around the world through micro-lending. 

What is a  Pure Entrepreneur? A man or woman who organizes resources and assumes the responsibility of changing the world through the creation of sustainable business(es) that solves problems and provides value for others.
teams.description: We believe entrepreneur is an overused term which is often assigned to every business owner. We contend that this is not correct and we are determined to raise the bar by restoring the meaning for entrepreneurship with a new definition.  In our view an entrepreneur is a man or woman who organizes resources and assumes the responsibility of changing the world through the creation of sustainable business(es) that solves problems and provides value for others.

teams.name: Green Partnerships
teams.loan_because: We want to help create more sustainable and equitable communities all around the world.
teams.description:
We lend to individuals and groups engaged in businesses and services that help them earn a living but also help to protect the environment in their part of the world. We also strive to build green partnerships in our own communities by supporting the women and men who provide businesses, services, and products that benefit people and the Earth. 

Some of our team members mainly fund green loans, while others choose to designate a fraction of their loans to green enterprises. These are examples of just some of the loans Green Partnerships has helped to fund:

teams.name: España - Spain

Este club se creó con la intención inicial de fomentar la participación de españolas y españoles en Kiva, no obstante,  está abierto a todas las personas que deseen unirse a él, sin importar su nacionalidad ni ninguna otra condición.
 
El único referente identitario de este grupo es la solidaridad y la convicción de que, a través de Kiva, es posible el apoyo a personas o grupos emprendedores que buscan y merecen una oportunidad por su esfuerzo.

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

We think this initiative is in the true spirit of humanity welfare projects like Mozilla Firefox.

We want to provide a strong motivation to DownloadHelper developers to work even harder on new features.

We think we can make a difference.
teams.description: This lending team replaces the donations made to Video DownloadHelper authors to sustain the development of this free software.

teams.name: Team Accion San Diego
teams.loan_because: We care about empowering entrepreneurs.
teams.description: Accion San Diego is a non-profit organization striving to bring economic opportunity and access to financing to small business owners in San Diego County.

teams.name: Research Now
teams.loan_because: We are commited to creating a better world and making a positive difference. We strive to be socially responsible and contribute to the welfare and interests of the greater society in which we operate.
teams.description: A global leader in permission-based digital data collection and reporting.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: UKY Kiva Chapter
teams.loan_because: Microfinance is the practice of improving the quality of life for entire communities starting at the micro level — the individual. When the financial needs of these underprivileged individuals are met, society only serves to benefit from the gradual elimination of poverty. The University of Kentucky Microfinance Club believes the student body and the Central Kentucky community can play a vital role in this mission.
teams.description: Linking the efforts of students, faculty, staff, and administration, the University of Kentucky Microfinance Club continually strives for the global elimination of poverty.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

teams.name: Global Gardeners
teams.loan_because:
As individuals and groups who share a passion for gardening we know;
'From little things, big things grow!
teams.description: We are gardeners hoping to make the world a better place by supporting organic and sustainable enterprises.

teams.name: Impossible League
teams.loan_because: We want to help people all over the world do the impossible.
teams.description: A small group of people living extraordinary lives by doing impossible things.

teams.name: Team Japan
teams.loan_because: we feel that we can help the world, one person at a time.
teams.description:
There are many Kiva lenders who live in Japan, and we hope to be able to make a difference, not only as individuals, but now as a team. Please feel free to join us....not only from anywhere in Japan, but anywhere in the world. All you need is an interest in Japan. 

一緒に貧困をなくしましょう．．．お待ちしています！

(Picture: Mt. Fuji and the full moon at sunrise New Year's Day 2010 写真：朝日の富士山と満月２０１０年元日）

teams.name: Dog Shame
teams.loan_because: We're dog lovers who support human entrepreneurship that benefits both individuals and animals.
teams.description: We're dog lovers who support human entrepreneurship that benefits both individuals and animals.

teams.name: Wiccans, (neo)Pagans, Witches and fellows
teams.loan_because: It does not harm so we do as we will
teams.description:
Open team. If you're a Wiccan or a Pagan, please join and show the World we exist and we're doing well.
[logo info: www.conjure.com/inspired.html]

teams.description: We are the true sons and daughters of the University of Missouri, and we know that we can make a difference. Mizzou is a school rich with tradition and support, and we want to spread that out into the world.
